### 'KPMG Ideathon’ 개최 사후 보도결과

```{r read-news}
library(tabulizer)
library(tidyverse)

press_table <- extract_tables(
  "data/보도결과_KPMG_Ideathon_20200302.pdf",
  pages=1,
  output = "data.frame",
  # method = "decide",
  guess = TRUE)

press_df <- press_table %>% .[[1]] %>% janitor::clean_names()

press_df %>% 
  select(-no) %>% 
  mutate(`기_사_제_목` = str_sub(`기_사_제_목`, 1, 20)) %>% 
  DT::datatable()
```
